extendedInfo.description: â Be sure to check out the youtube video of the app! âToday's technology already allow drivers to be guided by a GPS. To take this a step further, this app provides a system to monitor and analyze the driving quality by using the accelerometer (G-sensor) of your smartphone. This will help you determine if the driving is good or bad, helping you improving your own driving skills. Hence the name "Driving Skill Monitor" (DriSMo). The goal of this application is to emphasize the attention towards good driving quality and make the drivers aware of their own driving quality. By raising the awareness of driving quality, you can increase the quality of driving. Fuel efficiency will also be improved, as a result.Features:â Advanced quality monitoring  - Multiple monitor views  - Realtime quality feedback  - Text to speech supported (English only)â Retrospective trip analysis  - Quality graph  - Quality rating and general trip information  - Map view, including quality trackâ Map and GPS-trackingâ SMS auto-replyâ Power-saving optionâ Export quality data (CSV file)â Share your trip on FacebookFields of use:â Show off your driving skills, and compare them to other friends.â Prove that your car is of good quality, and that it is comfortable driving.â Measure acceleration, by using the debug monitor.â Save money on gas, by driving more smoothly! DriSMo is Open Source, and you can find the project at http://sourceforge.net/projects/drismo/ or check out the code at GitHub @ https://github.com/jmyrland/DriSMo.Found a bug/Got a feature request? Send us mail! :)Why all the permissions?â¢ Internett access: For downloading the map, and (if you want to) for posting to FB.â¢ Send SMS/Read SMS: If enabled, DriSMo will repsond to incoming messages with a predefined message.â¢ Read location (GPS): This is used to spot where you are, so the app can log and display the location on a map.â¢ Read phone state and incoming calls: If enabled, this is used to send a predefined message to incoming calls, to let them know you are driving.â¢ Storage and saving to SD-card: To log each trip, DriSMo saves a file for each trip on the SD-card.â¢ System tools: To prevent the phone from sleeping when assessing driving quality, and for running DriSMo in the background when driving.â¢ Control vibrator: To turn off the vibrator when assessing driving quality.-Ignore this-Keywords: vehicle, car, driving, ride, quality, skill, smooth driving, driving skill, car dock, car app, andicar, accelerometer, tracker, GPS, Waze, Google maps, Open Street Map, OSM, Navigator, Speedometer, HUD, g-forces, comparison, sms autoreply, facebook sharing, google+, g+, google plus,  drivesafe.ly, safe drive, car home, dashboard, speed watcher, careful driver.This is a real driving app, unlike smartphone simulation games like Drag Racing, Drift Mania, NEED FOR SPEED, Head To Head Racing, Championship Lite, Jet Car Stunts, Raging Thunder, Car Conductor, and other cool games!This app senses and analyzes the driving dynamics, not just visualizing and recording the speed and video, such as DailyRoads Voyager, AutoBoy BlackBox, SpeedView, Ulysse Speedometer, Ulysse Gizmos and other cool apps.This app puts focus on how people drive, not so much where people drive like some great navigation apps like VZ Navigator, My Verizon, waze, navigator by Verizon Wireless, my T-Mobile, iGo, AT&T navigator, Maverick, Sygic, Here I Am, Google Map Navigation, NAVIGON MobileNavigator, Beat the Traffic, Traffic Jam, RAC Traffic, and other cool apps.

reviews.comment: Cool stuff. Defenately worth trying and useful to settle a difference. Easy to use/calibrate. Just wish i could get to tthe csv files
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent App.
reviews.comment: It really makes you conscious of how easy you are on the car. Well made, but I wish it had ongoing calibration. It would smooth out the data on hills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Absolutely brilliant. Great stats I can use. Accurate mapping and helpful trainer. Just brill!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rates road surface, not driving
reviews.comment: Like many others have said, this is a great app for rating the condition of the road surface, but does nothing to rate the quality of your driving. Sitting at a light, I\'m an excellent driver, but once I start moving in rate as bad! Even on the highway with cruise on, the road bumps make the rating bad. Get real!
reviews.author: kirby baum

reviews.comment: There is no way this can judge how good of a driver you are if when you are driving across rough roads it says your a bad driver.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but u need ro update somw flaws
reviews.comment: It works great on newly paved roads but whenever you go over a hill, hit a bump or come to a stop it goes straight to the red. It needs to recognize the stops for sure
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app.
reviews.comment: Does what it says very well. Took one star off, cause\' still asks me to rate it after I allready have done it.
reviews.author: Oprean Marius

reviews.title: Good try
reviews.comment: But let down, on my Galaxy Ace, by bumps in the road swamping the horizontal accelerations which are the real signal of driving style. Great way of logging the quality of the road surface!
reviews.author: Neil Martyn

reviews.title: Great for the oldies.
reviews.comment: Far to sensitive. I rate myself as a fairly decent driver, every bump in the road I went over apparently made me a bad driver and every time I stopped at lights made me an excellent driver. This is for the old bids that drive around at 20mph the 1\'s that cause the accidents because people try to avoid there so called good driving.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is good, very critical of your driving if phone is not securely mounted but gives you the ability to compete against yourself with each trip
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Update works great now! Thanks for addressing the sensor issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful.
reviews.comment: Tested the app while driving a bus around the suburbs of Stockholm, SE. I managed to get the verdict \"good\". What pushed the verdict down was road bumps and damages which I simply could not avoid, while the vehicle is rather large. I couldn\'t drive any slower because I would have been late. The voice comments while driving is touching, sort of ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good, but...
reviews.comment: Very nice app. But unless the pothole and speed-breaker aspect is taken care of, it\'s useless in a country like India. I did my best driving on a non-congested road and still came up \'Okay\' thanks to the potholes. I hope you guys find a solution to that soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Useless app, even sticking to speed limits and under can\'t get it to show good driving, only time it does is when I stop as soon as the car starts moving again dial goes back down to bad driving, try the go compare app instead no active display of driving but gives a score after journey, seems far more accurate than this app, now off to delete it.
reviews.author: tim calvert

reviews.title: Needs sensitivity buffering
reviews.comment: Does a great job at what it\'s advertised to do. Five stars requires sensitivity option / buffering of sensor data and possible exclusion of bad data (impossible spike). Not all cars have soft suspension, and not all roads are perfect. Perhaps predefined options - 4x4 (quick buffer), regular, and sports (slow buffer to compensate for harder suspension). This app as is is great for measuring passenger comfort.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea let down by UK roads
reviews.comment: Agree with other reviewers - far too sensitive to potholes and other road conditions. I\'ve just driven to work, within speed limits, in cruise, gearbox braking with minimal foot brake use and slowing for corners. 19% bad, 79% ok, 2% good. I\'d love to know how you can get it to register excellent! I\'m sure tweaks could solve this, maybe the calibration is too severe....
reviews.author: Paul Williams

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: I love the couple of laughs it gave me when it commented on how well or painful my driving was as I drove. It crashes sometimes but not sure if it\'s just my phone\'s set up. I would like the option of a quick start upon taping a widget for example using a previous calibration setting. This is a great app for testing your driving skills and for those complaining about it being too sensitive, that could be just your phone, you\'re just not driving well enough, or you worry too much. Look for overall average.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Complete waste of time
reviews.comment: As a member of the Institute of Advanced Motorists, I want to find a program to monitor my driving. Unfortunately this is far from being it. It confuses bad road surfaces with bad driving. Driving up or down steep hills gives you a negative score and anything over a medium acceleration puts you in the red again. Taking a corner at more than 5 miles an hour gets you in the red too. Maybe this works well in suburban environments with perfect road surfaces in a car with incredibly soft suspension but in the UK countryside, forget it. If you really want to know how well you drive, talk to the IAM or ROSPA, this app is useless. (Phone is a stock galaxy S3. Test vehicle Daewoo Musso over 52.5 miles and Nissan Primera over 31.4 miles).
reviews.author: Steve Princep

reviews.title: Too sensitive
reviews.comment: Great app but you can end up with a bad driving mark just because of small dents or raises in the road which are unavoidable and don\'t feel that bad.
reviews.author: mathew o\'neil

reviews.title: What does it measure?
reviews.comment: It seems the app measures road surface conditions and the quality of the vehicle\'s suspension, more than anything else. In RSA, both are well below par... The app seems to be totally oblivious of one\'s driving prowess.
reviews.author: A Google User
